ingredients.content: 15 g fresh root ginger, peeled, cut in round slices (2 mm)
1 Chinese braising spice bag (approx. 15 g) (see tip)
400 - 500 g whole squid, medium (6-8 squid), gutted, washed (see tip)

preparations.content: Place ginger in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add sugar, dried chillies, soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice wine, water, spice bag and Sichuan pepper then, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>15 min/Varoma//speed <b>.

Add squid and, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>5 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Leave to infuse in mixing bowl with lid on for 5 minutes then carefully remove spice bag and transfer squid to a serving bowl. Garnish with coriander and serve hot.
